title: Spotted Dog Restaurant and Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Creative take on American-style cuisine with very large selection of vegan options (including but not limited to fake meats). Has full bar, relaxed atmosphere, local artwork. Tempeh and tofu dishes can be made vegan upon request. Entrees would range from $10-$15. Located in historic downtown Carrboro, right across from Carr Mill Mall. Offers veg options that are marked on the menu.
